series_title: Capital Outlay Project: Approval and Contract
series_description: Records This series documents the approval, authorization, and close-out of Capital Outlay Projects. This series may include, but is not limited to: approved close-out forms, contracts, bonds, and approved Department of General Services (DGS) forms.

series_title: Capital Outlay Project: Development and Review
series_description: Records This series documents the procurement, project development, tracking, inspection, and reporting of Capital Outlay Projects. This series may include, but is not limited to, daily and inspection reports, change order back-ups, and cost estimates.

Management This series documents the layout of college campuses and plans for future development. This series may include, but is not limited to, approved college master and stormwater management plans.
retention_statement: 0 Years after superseded, obsolete, or rescinded

series_description: This series documents all Real Estate transactions conducted on the college campuses. This series may include, but is not limited to: deeds, leases, easements, and agreements.

This series documents the working process of Capital Outlay Projects. This series may include, but is not limited to, approved preliminary drawings and designs, construction schedules, and bid documents.

This series documents the design progress of construction and renovation projects. This series may include, but is not limited to: schematics, preliminary and working drawings, bid documents, specifications, and other supporting data and documentation
This series contains the final approved development and management plans for each community college campus.
This series documents service firm's response to requests for proposals and/or qualifications for a specific project. This series may include, but is not limited to, correspondence.

This series documents service firm's response to requests for qualifications for small purchase procurements without a specific project. This series may include, but is not limited to, correspondence.
retention_statement: 0 Years after superseded, obsolete, or rescinded
